verses.roman:
vṛndāvane āsi' prabhu vasiyā ekānta
nāma-saṅkīrtana kare madhyāhna-paryanta

synonyms: vṛndāvane āsi'-coming to Vṛndāvana; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vasiyā—sitting; ekānta—in a solitary place; nāma-saṅkīrtana kare—performs chanting of the holy name; madhyāhna-paryanta—until noon.
translation: Therefore Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would go to Vṛndāvana and sit in a solitary place. It was there that He chanted the holy name until noon.
